named-query.name: selectTopicosdomarcadorpai
named-query.query: SELECT obj FROM Topico obj WHERE obj.id.marcadorpai LIKE ?

named-query.name: selectCollaborators
named-query.query: SELECT obj FROM Colaborador obj WHERE obj.id.tipodecolaborador LIKE ? AND obj.id.id != 18

named-query.name: selectCollaboratorsOthers
named-query.query: SELECT obj FROM Colaborador obj WHERE obj.id.tipodecolaborador IS NULL OR obj.id.tipodecolaborador LIKE ?

named-query.name: selectCollaboratorsCoordinators
named-query.query: SELECT obj FROM Colaborador obj WHERE obj.id.id = 18
